Set language:
Please let me know the language your prefer like this way: @lang/en @lang/ja
Or just check it on your mobile ~!

language.title: Set your language
language.text: Please let me know the language your prefer

No auth token: Sorry, sir! You didn't add any Google Analytics site yet. Please click https://analytics.google.com/ and send me back the URL displayed in your browser. I will add it myself!
Language changed to %s: Yes, sir! From now, I will use %s in this conversation!

howto.title: See how to ask Rookie!
howto.text: Rookie is your data management employee-chatbot! Send sticky or text to Rookie and bring in the data!

add.title: Add your Google Analytics account!
add.text:
Add new Google Analytics site to my list
Please copy and paste your Google analytics URL on this chatting room

init.title: Refresh chatting room!
init.text: Yes~ sir! I will refresh Google analytics list completely.

sorry.title: I'm sorry TT
sorry.text: I am really sorry TT There are many things I do not know yet. I will study more and better in the future!
